title: Slack
description: Slack's primary brand colors consist of a palette that includes: white (FFFFFF), a deep dark shade (1D1C1D), a rich purple (4A154B), a vibrant blue (36C5F0), a lively green (2EB67D), a bright yellow (ECB22E), and a striking pink (E01E5A). These colors are integral to the recognizable and modern visual identity of the brand, as detailed in their official brand guidelines accessible through their media kit.
